nodes.text: Carhart was a male Human who worked for the Republic Strategic Information Service during the Galactic War with the reconstituted Sith Empire. In the aftermath of the Battle of Corellia, Carhart was tasked by Supreme Chancellor Leontyne Saresh with recruiting individuals to aid the Republic's fight for the Black Hole region.
Agent Carhart provides Republic players with the mission "Corellia Rising," which was added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic in Game Update 1.1 along with the rest of the Black Hole.
